content: Started Repo and Vite App and chose to try and do the 100 projects in 100 days, or at least code 100 days
Made some updates to the general code template
Started coming up with project ideas but generally more template updates
Added some styling today and started and completed 1 project as well as some more updates to the base react app.  Background Color Changer Project started and completed
Apparently I found my codjo - you know mojo but for coders.  I can't seem to stop playing around with different parts of this project.  Not complaining, it feels good

So came up with some project ideas today.  Still playing with styling and such.  But why not.  Gonna use this log project in another project, a blog.  Of course that means I will have to edit the file that the logs are on to add a few things but why not... why make another file...although I might still do that....
Finally getting back into the project for real again.

Finished 1 project, the important dates.... although I am thinking I might make adjustments, I certainly need to make some CSS adjustments for sure. I also came up with (with a suggestion from a fellow developer) 2 more project ideas.
Today was just a CSS day.  I didn't do much just cleaned some of it up.

To today is day 50 and what I have realized is I haven't been keeping up with this log for 1.  I am not even close to 50 project yet for 2. And I have more ideas or started projects than finished ones. So that needs to change.
